#code to generate qPCR plots (Figure(s) __ in manuscript)

#install packages (ggplot2 & ggpubr for creating figures)

```{r}
#install.packages("ggplot2")
#install.packages("ggpubr")
```

#load libraries

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
```

#read in qPCR data

```{r}
qpcr <- read.csv("../Data/Alexandrium_qPCR_Results.csv")
```

#put date in date format for timeseries

```{r}
qpcr$Date <- as.Date(qpcr$Date, "%m/%d/%Y")
```

```{r}
qpcr_na <- qpcr[-which(qpcr$Quantity_Mean == ""), ]
```

#palettes

```{r}
hcl.colors(50, palette = "Sunset")
```

```{r}
"#704D9E" "#BC5AA9" "#ED7C97" "#F9B282" "#F3E79A"
```

```{r}
plot_qpcr <- ggplot(qpcr_na, aes(y = Quantity_Mean, x = Date)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_pubr() +
  scale_x_date(date_breaks = "1 month", date_labels = "%b %Y") +
  labs(x = NULL, y = "Alexandrium (copies per L)")
plot_qpcr
```
